value.string:
"""
 This script generates a sections list to filter the document on UNG Docs.
 XXX - The generation of domains should be more dynamic because some domains is create manually.
 """
 
 def appendTempDomain(id, 
 title,
 property_dict,
 parent=parent,
 membership_criterion_base_category=(),
 membership_criterion_category=()):
 domain = parent.generateTempDomain(id=id)
 domain.edit(title=title,
 domain_generator_method_id=script.id,
 membership_criterion_base_category=membership_criterion_base_category,
 membership_criterion_category=membership_criterion_category) 
 
 domain.setCriterionPropertyList(property_dict.keys())
 for key, value in property_dict.items():
 domain.setCriterion(key, value)
 
 if parent.getId() == "ung_domain":
 domain_list.append(domain)
 return domain
 
 domain_list = []
 validation_state_list = ['draft', 'published', 'shared']
 
 if depth == 1:
 return domain_list
 
 appendTempDomain('all_document_list', 
 'All Documents', 
 dict(validation_state=validation_state_list))
 
 appendTempDomain('hidden_document_list', 
 'Hidden', 
 dict(validation_state=['hidden']))
 
 appendTempDomain('opened_document_list', 
 'Opened by me', 
 dict(local_roles='Owner', validation_state=validation_state_list))
 
 appendTempDomain('owner_document_list', 
 'Owned by me',
 dict(local_roles='Owner', validation_state=validation_state_list))
 
 appendTempDomain('shared_document_list', 
 'Shared by me',
 dict(validation_state=['shared']))
 
 appendTempDomain('starred_document_list',
 'Starred',
 dict(validation_state=validation_state_list))
 
 appendTempDomain('trash_document_list',
 'Trash',
 dict(validation_state=['deleted']))
 
 domain = appendTempDomain('webpage_module_list',
 'Document by Type',
 dict(portal_type=["Web Page", "Web Illustration", "Web Table"],
 validation_state=validation_state_list))
 
 appendTempDomain('subWebPage',
 'Web Page',
 dict(validation_state=validation_state_list, portal_type=["Web Page"]),
 domain,
 ("webpage_module_list",),
 ("webpage_module_list",))
 
 appendTempDomain('subWebTable',
 'Web Table',
 dict(validation_state=validation_state_list, portal_type=["Web Table"]),
 domain,
 ("webpage_module_list",),
 ("webpage_module_list",))
 
 appendTempDomain('subWebIllustration',
 'Web Illustration',
 dict(validation_state=validation_state_list, portal_type=["Web Illustration"]),
 domain,
 ("webpage_module_list",),
 ("webpage_module_list",))
 
 return domain_list
